title: Understanding the 85th Percentile
text: The percentage of data values that are less than or equal to the 85th percentile is 85%.

title: Determining Directionality
text: Based on this, since the 85th percentile for time spend waiting at the DMV is $$32$$ minutes, does that equate to 85% of people waiting at the DMV for $$32$$ minutes or less OR $$32$$ minutes or more?
